titles: The country mans Paradice. See George and Nell that love full well say killing is no vice, the country and making hay he calls a paradice. To the tune of Philander.
publisher: Printed for J. Wright, J. Clark, W. Thackery and T. Passenger.,
notes: Place and date of publication from Wing CD-ROM, 1996
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University, Houghton Library.
keywords: Songs, English --  Texts --  Early works to 1800.
